About

Senior Consultant working with Capgemini America Inc.
Software development professional with expertise in Pivotal Cloud Foundry, Java, Springboot and Spring Cloud.
I have working experience in Microservice and Monoliths Architecture.
Big fan and promotor of Agile frameworks and Test Driven Development.
I have also organized trainings ans sessions on multiple technologies as part of my job.
Experience include software development, consulting, coaching, automation, debugging and pair programming.
I do have working experience of Logistics, Transportation, Banking and Financial domain.
I am always interested in learning new technologies.

I recently started writing blogs over new and interesting things I come across
I like to travel and cook in my free time.
I inspire and lead teams to do better, be better, perform better & be more efficient.
My hobby is reading blogs and binge watching Netflix.
